faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Have another question? Contact us by email.
faq.tip: Can't find what you're looking for? Contact our customer support team

items.question: How much does it cost to use SubtitleTK?
items.answer: SubtitleTK is a high-performance digital toolkit designed to extract and translate subtitles from YouTube and TikTok videos. We believe in simple, transparent pricing. Our current model is: 1 Credit for Subtitle Extraction. 1 Credit for Video Download (TikTok). 1 Credit for AI Translation services. (Note: Each specific action consumes exactly one credit, making it easy to manage your balance.)

items.question: What happens if an extraction fails?
items.answer: At SubtitleTK, we value your trust. If a video is restricted, private, or the system fails to process it, our Automatic Refund Policy ensures that your credit is immediately returned to your account.

items.question: How many languages can I translate into?
items.answer: SubtitleTK supports 12+ major global languages for AI translation, including English, Chinese, Spanish, French, German, Japanese, and more. This allows you to localize any viral content for your specific target audience.

items.question: Can I preview the results before downloading?
items.answer: Yes. After the processing reaches 100%, you can visit your Activity dashboard to see a preview table of the first 10 subtitle segments. Once you are satisfied, you can download the full .SRT file.

items.question: Why is the translation process sometimes slower than extraction?
items.answer: While extraction is nearly instant, AI Translation is processed in smart chunks (4,000 characters each) to maintain high linguistic accuracy and bypass technical limits. For long videos, this may take 1-2 minutes to ensure every word is perfectly translated.

items.question: Where are my files stored?
items.answer: Your processed files and video metadata are stored securely in our private cloud storage. You can access your history and download your files at any time via the Activity tab in your dashboard.
